backend/main.mo: Defines user wellness data types and includes authorization and blob storage mixins, providing queries like admin-restricted user retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a change to restore text-based branding on the landing page header.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in authentication, onboarding, dashboard pages, and management components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling auth flow, onboarding, profile setup, and dashboard routing with a welcome tutorial.
frontend/src/components/DebtManagement.t: UI component for adding, editing, deleting debts and logging payments with progress tracking and charts.
frontend/src/components/MedicationManage: UI component for medication CRUD operations and adherence logging with dialog-driven interactions.
A modal tutorial component introducing SHAMMAH’s features and wellness pillars with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, onboarding, photos, and other backend interactions with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables and theming for light and dark modes with wellness-focused palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and dynamic rendering of wellness pages based on selected section.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JournalPage: Journal interface showing entries and a dialog to add new ones using addJournalEntry.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/Mindfulness: Mindfulness tracking page listing activities and a dialog to log new meditation or mindfulness sessions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/OverviewPag: Dashboard overview showing wellness progress, pillar breakdown, and recent journal and mindfulness activity.
Renders a wellness pillar page with activity logging, reflection input, trackers, and condition-based components like medication and habit monitoring.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/QuizPage.ts: Implements a multi-step quiz that saves responses and displays a completion summary once all questions are answered.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ResourcesPa: Displays categorized wellness resources including videos, ebooks, and guides using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/RewardsPage: Shows user rewards, points, and earned or in-progress badges with visual progress sections.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with branding, hero content, and Internet Identity sign‑in flow, including login card and disabled Google option.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingFlow.tsx: Guided onboarding flow handling baseline photo upload and multi‑question wellness quiz with backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: User profile setup form allowing email and display name submission via createProfile mutation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, plugins, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including branding rollback issues, architectural notes, known build problems, and lists existing and new feature requests. Primarily tracks header-image revert needs and pending wellness app enhancements.
